articles.title: Research Shows One Easy Diet Swap Can Reduce Blood Pressure And Heart Attacks - ScienceAlert
articles.description: One in three Australian adults has high blood pressure (hypertension).
articles.content: One in three Australian adults has high blood pressure (hypertension). Excess salt (sodium) increases the risk of high blood pressure so everyone with hypertension is advised to reduce salt in their … [+6255 chars]
